data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

requestBody.title: Customer one books primary offer Snapshot

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Inspect route/dispatch state after bookings and verify assignment/ETA/operational telemetry consistency.
data.expectedResult: Route/dispatch records align with bookings and can be used for operations decisions.
